title: Rethinking the NBA MVP Race
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss how Jayson Tatum and the red hot Celtics measure up against the rest of the East, AND did Nikola Jokic just push Joel Embiid out of the MVP lead? The Warriors might be in trouble, especially if they see the Lakers again in the playoffs. PLUS, are the Grizzlies just a “regular season” team or will they have playoff success?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
